base_description: Rectangular white desk with modern design.
part_description: Features a flat top, vertical back panel, and three open compartments above a sliding door. The compartments are evenly spaced, and the sliding door covers the lower section.
internal_interaction_description: The three compartments provide storage space and are supported by the back panel. The sliding door moves horizontally along a track, allowing access to the lower section without obstructing the top or compartments.
external_interaction_description: The desk serves as a workspace, interacting with external objects like computers or books placed on top. The sliding door allows users to access stored items easily, while the open compartments can hold decorative items or office supplies.
